title: Can't Answer phone. Tired everything can't figure out how to answer phone went to AT&T they couldn't
content:
Can't Answer My Phone.. We have tired everything on how to answer my phone. Went to AT&T spent 3 hours they couldn't figure it out.. Tech guy stated something major is wrong with this phone... I am 70 years old and having this problem is very major.... I have gotten strained and couldn't call my husband.. I am very dissatisfied with the Google Pixel 4...I thought Google was good and they honor their products... Please help me or send me another phone that work.

Thank You......
